languages.text: "Может быть, в момент смерти она обрекла покой, которого была лишена при жизни. По крайней мере, мне хотелось бы в это верить".
"Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."
languages.original_text: "Может быть, в момент смерти она обрекла покой, которого была лишена при жизни. По крайней мере, мне хотелось бы в это верить".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “或许在她死去的那一瞬间，她找到了这一生从未有过的安宁。至少，我愿意相信是这样的。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."

traits.locale_text: “或许在她死去的那一瞬间，她找到了这一生从未有过的安宁。至少，我愿意相信是这样的。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Dans la mort, elle a peut-être trouvé la paix dont elle a été privée tout au long de sa vie. C'est du moins ce que j'aimerais croire. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."

traits.locale_text: « Dans la mort, elle a peut-être trouvé la paix dont elle a été privée tout au long de sa vie. C'est du moins ce que j'aimerais croire. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez en el momento de su muerte encontrara la paz que no encontró en vida. Me gustaría creer que es el caso».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez en el momento de su muerte encontrara la paz que no encontró en vida. Me gustaría creer que es el caso».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「おそらくイディラは死の瞬間に、人生から奪われていた平穏にたどり着いたのです。少なくとも、私はそう思いたいです」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらくイディラは死の瞬間に、人生から奪われていた平穏にたどり着いたのです。少なくとも、私はそう思いたいです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht hat sie im Augenblick ihres Todes den Frieden gefunden, der ihr im Leben nicht vergönnt war. Zumindest rede ich mir das ein."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht hat sie im Augenblick ihres Todes den Frieden gefunden, der ihr im Leben nicht vergönnt war. Zumindest rede ich mir das ein."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."

languages.text: "Belki ölümünde, hayattayken mahrum kaldığı huzuru bulmuştur. En azından ben buna inanmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps at the moment of her death, she found the peace she had been deprived of in life. At least, that is what I would like to believe."

traits.locale_text: "Belki ölümünde, hayattayken mahrum kaldığı huzuru bulmuştur. En azından ben buna inanmak istiyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
